title: The Catherine Wheel
brief_description: Twyla Tharp, a leading choreographer, and David Byrne of “Talking Heads” fame have worked together to masterfully crosscut fragments of emotion through music and movement. This breathtaking and explosive piece of dance theatre broke new ground in modern dance and music. Rated: G
